channel.title: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))
channel.description:
Alright I have been hosting/coding for a few months and this week my dads objected to running my server he says "its a waste of time" "soaks up all internet" he never uses internet lol all he does is when Im away/busy or out house he goes on my computer and exits run.bat and it pisses me off so much (closes server down) heres screen print
[URL=http://allyoucanupload.webshots.com/v/2001779965492114875][IMG]http://aycu02.webshots.com/image/47321/2001779965492114875_rs.jpg[/img][/URL]
Ok you see vipscape auto reset I need to hide that because If my dad cannot see that he will think its offline so If I can get it to run in back ground or something funny like that It would be great and I could host my server without my dad noticing so please is there anyway I can hide it without
1: moving bar : He will know I moved bar and am running it -.-
2:Without getting my brothers laptop and hosting on there???
Hopefully I can hide the vipscape auto reset please help ?

item.title: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))
item.dc:creator: @Marc3239099 Marc3239099
item.description:
@Marc3239099 wrote:

Graham your a legend thanks dude!!!

Read full topic
item.source: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))

item.title: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

If your trying to hide it, hide the batch file in your windows folder, make a shortcut, change the title of the bat(where it says title inside the batch) file to "internet explorer’, and change the name to that, then right click, go to properties, click shortcut, change the icon to the internet icon, and wala.

you’ll have an icon that looks and runs like its internet explorer (when its minimized)

Read full topic

item.source: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))

item.title: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))
item.dc:creator: @Marc3239099 Marc3239099
item.description:
@Marc3239099 wrote:

[quote=“sw1tchez, post:15, topic:193139”][quote author=Marc3239099 link=topic=257107.msg2137204#msg2137204 date=1206578651]
I copy and pasted my current server restarter and called the copy

stophiddenserver.bat.

where I add

@echo off
tskill javaw
[/quote]

Okay, i tried it, and it works perfectly, this is all you have to do

  1. Right click you’re run.bat, erase everything and put in this

@echo off
start javaw server

press “save as” and name it runserver-hidden.bat

then make a new text file called stophiddenserver.bat and put this in it

@echo off
tskill javaw

[Graham, please don’t call this “leaching” or anything, It is 100% credits to you i’m just helping it explain it]
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2008, 01:55:10 PM[/size][hr]Oh sorry didn’t see you already posted this ! you posted it right when i posted mine :P[/quote]

Alright then I click on the bat file and server should be running?

Read full topic

item.source: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))

item.title: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Basically, create a file called runserver-hidden.bat or something like that. Then put this in it:

@echo off
start javaw server

Then make a batch file called stophiddenserver.bat. Inside it put:

@echo off
tskill javaw

The top one will start a hidden server. The bottom one will end it (and anything else using Javaw.exe so if you were using a client eg MoparScape that would end too).

Read full topic

item.title: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))
item.dc:creator: @Marc3239099 Marc3239099
item.description:
@Marc3239099 wrote:

[quote=“Graham, post:5, topic:193139”][quote author=Marc3239099 link=topic=257107.msg2137168#msg2137168 date=1206577655]
No I mean take off bar and hide somewhere so when He checks he wont see it and will think im not running it
[/quote]

It will. START will run a program but not wait for it to end.

JAVAW is java without a console window.

Just try it in your batch file.

ok unlock your toolbar kk and then use the lil arrow to make it go down like this

and then lock it back =]

Then his Dad would probably get the toolbar back up to use the PC properly.[/quote]

I dont understand lol

Read full topic

item.title: HELP hiding run.bat from my dad please help ((picture))
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Marc3239099:

No I mean take off bar and hide somewhere so when He checks he wont see it and will think im not running it

It will. START will run a program but not wait for it to end.

JAVAW is java without a console window.

Just try it in your batch file.

[quote=“cocoa, post:4, topic:193139”]ok unlock your toolbar kk and then use the lil arrow to make it go down like this

and then lock it back =][/quote]

Then his Dad would probably get the toolbar back up to use the PC properly.
